full_text: Leonardo, working in partnership with the Royal Air Force’s Rapid Capabilities Office (RCO), have together successfully conducted a live trial of a ‘swarming drones’ capability.

title: Teledyne Paradise Wins Multiple Contract Awards Totaling Over $7.0M for PowerMAX SSPA Systems
full_text: Teledyne Paradise Datacom announced recent contract awards totaling $7.4 million to provide numerous PowerMAX solid-state power amplifier (SSPA) systems over the course of the next two years.

title: Innovatively Powered AOTFS Help A Spectrometer Transmit Eye-opening Data From Mars
full_text: Currently making incredible discoveries in Mars’ atmosphere, the NOMAD instrument, was launched in 2016 and began science operations in 2018. In 2014, ERZIA delivered RF Driver Amplifiers for the NOMAD instrument for installation on the Trace Gas Orbiter (TGO) of the ExoMars mission.

title: NGC Advances Maritime EW Capability with Follow On Production Contract From US Navy
full_text: Northrop Grumman Corporation was awarded a follow on production contract for AN/SLQ-32(V)7 SEWIP Block 3 systems by the U.S. Navy. The system is employed on Surface Combatants to defeat legacy and emerging anti-ship threats using non-kinetic/electronic attack methodologies.

title: Elbit Awarded a $33M Contract to Supply Radio Systems for an Army in Asia-Pacific
full_text: Elbit Systems Ltd. announced that it was awarded a contract valued at approximately $33 million to supply tactical radio systems to a customer in Asia-Pacific.

title: Switzerland Approved for Joint Strike Fighter, Super Hornet, Modernized Fire Units and Weapons Sale
full_text: The State Department has made a determination approving a possible Foreign Military Sale to the Government of Switzerland of five Patriot Configuration-3+ Modernized Fire Units, forty F-35 Joint Strike Fighter aircrafts and forty F/A-18E/F Super Hornet aircrafts.

title: Mercury's Latest Microwave Tuner Delivers Unparalleled Flexibility and Speed
full_text: Mercury Systems Inc announced the TAC-3290 family of adaptive microwave tuners that deliver multi-mission operation to a wide range of applications such as signal intelligence (SIGINT) and radio frequency (RF) testing.

title: Kymeta™ u8 Terminal Receives Commercial Authorization from FCC for Q4 2020 Launch
full_text: Kymeta announced that the FCC has granted blanket authorization for the operation of its next-generation electronically steered, flat-panel Earth station in motion (ESIM) platform, the Kymeta™ u8 terminal.
